verses.name: Matthew 23:34
verses.text: Wherefore, behold, I send unto you prophets, and wise men, and scribes: and some of them ye shall kill and crucify; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues, and persecute them from city to city:

verses.name: Matthew 23:35
verses.text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth, from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias, whom ye slew between the temple and the altar.

verses.name: Matthew 23:36
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, All these things shall come upon this generation.
